locationDescription:
This is the Cockpit. The PILOT flies the plane from here, you should see if he survived...
Maybe you can TALK to the PILOT and find out what happened. 

If you go outside the plane you might get lost maybe something in here can help you navigate around the dense unknown forest.
This is the First Class seating area.
This is the Economy sitting area.
This is the Service Area typically run by the flight attendants. There might be something edible near by...
You are outside the plane crash. Dense tropical rainforest surround the area.
Dense tropical rainforest surround the area. You hear sounds of water nearby, and hisses of a SNAKE
The forest seems too dense to go any further at this point. Might be best to re-trace your steps.
You come across an old steel bridge that splits EAST and SOUTH is appears to be wrapped in vegetation. Seems safe to cross...Hopefully there is no TROLL!
You found a hidden forest village that has seen better days, however, you see human faces about. You feel relieved, but do not know if they are friendly or foe.
Upon entering the village, you notice a peculiar building with the signage that reads, "TLG"...odds are odd, but you decide to check it out.
You hear low growling noises, and you see what looks to be a mutated BEAR and probably the result of a bad science experiment! This ain't your homegrown poo-bear, no sir.
